seller_description: Get irresistible cush for your tush with Charmin Ultra Soft Smooth Tear. Every roll is crafted with wavy perforations that tear better, for a smooth, more enjoyable go. And each sheet of toilet paper is 2X more absorbent so you can use less (vs. the leading USA 1-ply bargain brand). We made it MEGA in size, so you get mega value. That’s right, our Charmin Ultra Soft Mega Roll equals 4 regular rolls (based on number of sheets in Charmin Regular Roll bath tissue), so you’ll be running back to the store less and less. Our Charmin Ultra Soft toilet paper is also 2-ply and designed to be clog-safe and septic-safe. We all go, why not Enjoy The Go with America’s favorite toilet paper. Charmin Brand based on sales. Source: Nielsen 2022 dollar sales.
review: I love that this has the scalloped easy tear edges. It’s also very soft and durable so you need less. And just looking at the scalloped edges makes me smile because it feels fancy.
Expected_output: Based on the provided seller description, images, and buyer review, the alignment between the seller's claims and the buyer's experience is evident. The seller emphasizes the innovative Smooth Tear scalloped edges, softness, durability, and absorbency of the Charmin Ultra Soft toilet paper, all while ensuring value through its mega-sized rolls. The buyer's review confirms satisfaction with these features, particularly praising the scalloped edges for their ease of use and visual appeal, as well as the product's softness and durability, which reduce usage and elevate the overall experience. The seller's images, showing clear branding and scalloped details, match the buyer's images of the product, affirming authenticity. There are no discrepancies or dissatisfaction expressed in the buyer's review; instead, the buyer enthusiastically endorses the product, finding it both practical and aesthetically pleasing. Thus, the seller has successfully delivered as promised, and the buyer is highly satisfied. Here, the seller is not at fault, and the product aligns seamlessly with its advertised qualities.
label: 1: Here buyer agreed with the seller
